body: Hi Pin, You can update your LB version directly by using "Ladybug_Update Ladybug". [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/AqI8DM8vlq5O*k50BRdZSiAWh9pIrNuHxQV5rpaeO3kZbXAe9lEXQJaTwVO8eBIdR-d9Ia0PQ7J1SsxgZShylZzdqyN8OaN3/update.png) It comes from here: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/AqI8DM8vlq5W5rDCKuQAOOYvrqoMeyH1COS0KId7KuKHBH3SAzC3sLYk8oNnoYFsrHaohYwf3dyp-IM2Ci8hkNJ6NmZu2Q76/update02.png) Best Antonello
